Question: This person felt the March was a victory for him as well and bolstered the chances for his civil rights bill.
Hints: This person defeated Vice President and Republican candidate Richard Nixon in the 1960 U.S.
This person initially followed Eisenhower's lead, using limited military action to fight the communist forces led by Ho Chi Minh.
This person defended both McNamara (March, 1963) and Gilpatric (August 1963) in press conferences.
